meanings.sent1: The garlanded tree looked beautiful in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The bride wore a garlanded veil on her wedding day.
meanings.sent3: The garlanded puppy wagged its tail happily.
meanings.sent4: The garlanded archway welcomed guests to the party.
meanings.sent5: The garlanded entranceway set a festive mood for the event.

meanings.definition: Decorated with a wreath or chain of flowers.
meanings.sent1: The garlanded table was the centerpiece of the room.
meanings.sent2: The garlanded balcony added a touch of nature to the apartment.
meanings.sent3: The garlanded bicycle looked ready for a flower parade.
meanings.sent4: The garlanded doorway framed the garden beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The garlanded mantlepiece brought a fresh scent indoors.
